question: Some parents believe that cell phones are harmful to children, while others disagree. Discuss both views and give your own opinion
text: It is often argued by some people that a mobile contact is negatively  affected to child who are growing age. By contrast, many people disagree with this opinion that, say, dial is harming to kid. IN my honest view, I agree with most of the parents.
